welcome_modal.title: JTI Godda mein aapka Swagat hai!
welcome_modal.greeting: Namaste! Chaliye, aapko hamari tech ki duniya explore karne ke liye set up karte hain.

home_page.hero_title: JTI Godda ke saath apna Future Unlock karein
home_page.hero_subtitle: Technology mein ek safal career ke liye aapka gateway. Hum next generation ke IT professionals ko empower karne ke liye top-tier computer education dete hain.
home_page.why_jti_subtitle: Hum practical skills aur career readiness par focus ke saath best learning experience dene ke liye committed hain.
home_page.expert_instructors_desc: Anubhavi industry professionals se seekhein jo padhane ke liye passionate hain.
home_page.practical_curriculum_desc: Hamare courses hands-on experience aur real-world skills dene ke liye design kiye gaye hain.
home_page.job_assistance_desc: Hum graduation ke baad aapko apna career launch karne mein madad ke liye placement support dete hain.
home_page.featured_courses_subtitle: Hamare sabse popular courses ke saath shuruaat karein, jo sabhi skill levels ke liye design kiye gaye hain.
home_page.testimonial1_text: "JTI Godda ne mujhe IT mein apna career shuru karne ke liye skills aur confidence diya. Instructors bahut achhe hain aur hamesha madad ke liye taiyar rehte hain."
home_page.testimonial2_text: "Tally seekhne ka practical approach zabardast tha. Maine apna course poora karne ke turant baad ek accountant ki job le li."

courses_page.title: Hamare Courses
courses_page.subtitle: Technology mein apne career ko kickstart ya advance karne ke liye perfect course dhundhein.

about_page.title: JTI Godda ke Baare Mein
about_page.subtitle: 2001 se quality technical education ke zariye Jharkhand ke youth ko empower kar rahe hain.
about_page.mission_desc: Godda aur aas-paas ke areas ke students ko accessible, affordable, aur high-quality computer education dena. Hamara maqsad unhe hamesha badalte IT industry mein safal hone ke liye zaroori practical skills aur knowledge se लैस karna hai.
about_page.history_desc: 12 January, 2001 ko sthapit, Jharkhand Technical Institute (JTI) Private Limited digital divide ko kam karne ke vision ke saath shuru hua tha. Pichhle do dashakon mein, humne hazaron students ko safaltapoorvak train kiya hai, unhe jobs paane aur ek achha career banane mein madad ki hai.
about_page.corporate_info_subtitle: Hum transparency ke saath kaam karte hain aur ek registered private limited company hain.
about_page.directors_subtitle: JTI Godda ko behtareen banane wali leadership team se milein.

contact_page.title: Humse Judein
contact_page.subtitle: Hum yahan madad ke liye hain! Agar aapke paas hamare courses ke baare mein sawaal hain ya guidance chahiye, to bejhijhak sampark karein.
contact_page.address_value: H/O- Mritunjay Prasad, Pathra Road, Sarkanda, PS-Godda Mufsil, Godda, Jharkhand 814133

contact_form.message_placeholder: Bataein hum kaise madad kar sakte hain...
contact_form.success_desc: Humse contact karne ke liye dhanyavaad. Hum jald hi aapse sampark karenge.

login_page.title: Student Login
login_page.description: Apne account mein login karne ke liye neeche apna email daalein
login_page.success_desc: Aapko aapke dashboard par redirect kiya ja raha hai...

admission_page.title: Admission Application Form
admission_page.description: Apply karne ke liye neeche diya gaya form bharein. Aapki application hamari team dwara review ki jayegi.
admission_page.course_placeholder: Apply karne ke liye ek course chunein
admission_page.success_desc: Aapke application ke liye dhanyavaad. Hum isse review karenge aur jald hi aapse sampark karenge.

dashboard_page.subtitle: Yahan JTI Godda ke saath aapki profile aur billing ka overview hai.
dashboard_page.card_desc: Apne invoices aur payment status track karein.
dashboard_page.no_bills: Aapke paas abhi tak koi bills nahi hain.
dashboard_page.payment_toast_desc: Aapko bill {billNumber} ke liye pay karne ke liye redirect kiya ja raha hai. (Yeh ek demo hai)

cca.title: Certificate in Computer Application (CCA)
cca.description: Computer operations aur zaroori office apps ka 3-mahine ka intro course.

dca.title: Diploma in Computer Application (DCA)
dca.description: Computer fundamentals, MS Office, aur internet skills par 6-mahine ka course.

adca.title: Advanced Diploma in Computer Application (ADCA)
adca.description: 1-saal ka program jisme DCA, Tally, DTP, aur C programming ka intro shamil hai.

tally.title: Tally Prime with GST
tally.description: Accounting aur GST ke liye Tally Prime mein 3-mahine ka specialized course.

dtp.title: Desktop Publishing (DTP)
dtp.description: Photoshop, CorelDRAW, aur PageMaker ke saath professional layout design seekhein.

typing_en.title: English Typing Course
typing_en.description: Structured lessons ke saath fast aur accurate English typing skills develop karein.

typing_hi.title: Hindi Typing (Mangal/Krutidev)
typing_hi.description: Professional kaam ke liye Mangal aur Krutidev fonts par Hindi typing mein master banein.

web.title: Web Development Basics
web.description: Web development ka introduction jisme HTML, CSS, aur JavaScript cover kiya gaya hai.

python.title: Python Programming
python.description: Versatile Python language seekhein, basic syntax se lekar advanced topics tak.

java.title: Java Programming
java.description: Majboot, enterprise-level applications banane ke liye Java mein gehri jaankari.

cpp.title: C++ Programming
cpp.description: High-performance applications aur systems programming ke liye C++ mein master banein.

cs11.title: Computer Science (Class 11th)
cs11.description: Class 11th Computer Science ke liye CBSE/JAC curriculum-based coaching.

cs12.title: Computer Science (Class 12th)
cs12.description: Class 12th Computer Science board exams ke liye advanced coaching.

it.title: Information Technology (IT)
it.description: Hardware, software, aur networking jaise IT fundamentals ko cover karne wala ek broad course.

ites.title: IT Enabled Services (ITES)
ites.description: BPO, KPO, aur doosre business processes jaise IT-enabled services ke baare mein seekhein.
